segments.text: My som was lost . I told him to stand rooted to the spot when I went shopping , but he ignored it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you find him at last ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was the police wo helped me to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It must have taught you a lesson this time .
segments.speaker: S2
